device.name: signal-bus
device.documentation: The <class>signal-bus</class> class implements a signal bus that distributes a signal from one or more initiators to a configured list of targets. Both the signal bus itself and all targets implement the <iface>signal</iface> interface. The initiator must also comply to the <iface>signal</iface> interface, with the exception that multiple initiators are allowed for <class>signal-bus</class> class.
